book.title: Squib and His Friends
book.description: 简介： That was the name Squib went by in the nursery and in the householdthe odd one. Not exactly because of any personal peculiaritiesalthough he had a few of thesebut because he had no especial brother or sister belonging to him, and seemed to stand alon...
